tripleplay.ui

Class Layout.Constraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.ui.Layout.Constraint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsoluteLayout.Constraint, AxisLayout.Constraint, BorderLayout.Constraint, Constraints.TextConstraint, TableLayout.Colspan
    Enclosing class:
    Layout

    public abstract static class Layout.Constraint
extends Object
    An abstract base class for all layout constraints.
